Package com.ethercis.servicemanager.jmx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    I_AdminService
    Declares available methods to control an instance service.
    I_AdminUsage
    Declares available methods to control arbitrary services.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotatedMBean
    JMX helper class
    JmxLogLevel
    Definition of a dynamic MBean which exports the logging properties.
    JmxMBeanHandle
    Container to hold the ObjectInstance,mBean and ContextNode triple.
    JmxProperties
    Definition of a dynamic MBean which exports the ClusterController properties.
    JmxWrapper
    JmxWrapper wraps the MBeanServer instance.
    LowMemoryDetector
    Get notification when heap memory usage exceeds 90%.
    LowMemoryDetectorTest  
    MethodInvocation
    MethodInvocation is wrapper for Invocation of Methods and the returning Objects TODO: Implement check before invoke if TargetHost is current Host!
    SerializeHelper
    Used for Serialization and deserialization for Objects
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Description
    used to give description to mbeans
    PName
    used to give parameter names in mbean
